# How does it work?

Once you've created your AI agent/chatbot within My AskAI, and trained it on all your existing help docs, your team can then start using it as an AI copilot for your support agents.

You can use it on any website. And it even adds an "AI answer" button into your Intercom, Zendesk and Freshdesk/Freshchat inboxes and workspaces ‚Äî so you can draft AI replies in the click of one button (check out the video above)

# Create your AI agent/copilot in 10 minutes

- Create a free account for 30 days at: https://myaskai.com/ai-copilot-chrome-extension
- Add your help docs (knowledge base or Intercom / Zendesk articles) to train your AI agent
- Install this Chrome Extension
- And...you're done!

# Decide how you want to use your new AI copilot in Chrome

- ‚ú® Within Intercom, Zendesk, and Freshdesk/Freshchat agents can draft AI replies, using the conversation history with the press of a button
- Agents can open the extension at any time to start chatting with your AI support agent
- Agents can select and right-click on any question or message from a customer and launch the AI support agent

# Other things you can do with My AskAI

- Add directly within Intercom, Zendesk, Freshdesk/Freshchat, or HubSpot to automatically reply directly to your customers, and transfer them to an agent when they ask (human handover)
- Auto reply to support emails (works will all email providers)
- As an internal chatbot for your employees (in Slack or Teams)
- To understand what your customers are asking with AI conversational insights
